mapper.select: SELECT i.inn_name, i.inn_loc, i.inn_ment, i.inn_info, i.inn_sep, r.room_uid, r.room_name, r.room_info, r.room_pic, r.room_first_cost, r.room_last_cost FROM inn i, room r WHERE i.inn_uid = r.inn_uid and i.inn_uid = #{inn_uid};

SELECT re.review_uid, re.review_title, re.review_star, re.review_content, re.review_id, m.member_uid, m.member_id, m.member_pic FROM review re, book b, room r, inn i, member m WHERE re.book_uid = b.book_uid and b.member_uid = m.member_uid and b.room_uid = r.room_uid and r.inn_uid = i.inn_uid and i.inn_uid = #{inn_uid};
